Classes in oaidtb.boosters that implement ErrorUpperBoundComputer

 class AdaBoostM1

 class AdaBoostM1W
          A modification of AdaBoostM1 which works better with weak base classifiers; for more information see: [1] - Günther Eibl & Karl Peter Pfeiffer How to make AdaBoost.M1 work for weak base classifiers by changing only one line of the code.
 class AdaBoostOC
          Class for boosting using Schapire's AdaBoostOC.
